612650.name: Kona Original Soundtrack
612650.description:
Relive the unique atmosphere of Kona with the original score by CuréLabel. Inspired by our story, CuréLabel delivered original Quebecois rock music that blends tradition and modernity. Here is the track list:

  • 1- Kona (Thème)
  • 2- Vision
  • 3- Diligence
  • 4- La Danse du Barbier
  • 5- Menace
  • 6- Légère Accalmie
  • 7- Kona (Route 1970)
  • 8- Nocturne
  • 9- OVNI
  • 10- Non Retour
  • 11- Kona (Variation)

Upon purchase, you will find the soundtrack (in FLAC and MP3 format) in your Steam directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Kona\Soundtrack.
612650.supported_languages:
法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
